Interface IUpgradeable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArcherTower, FireTower, IceTower, LaserTower
public interface IUpgradeable
Contract for any game entity (usually Towers) that supports a leveling system. Enforces methods for cost calculation, stat improvement, and level capping.
